meanings.definition: A person who adheres to or advocates ultrarealism.
meanings.sent1: The ultrarealists in our group always seek the truth in everything.
meanings.sent2: She is known as one of the ultrarealists in the art community.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarealists at the debate club never shy away from discussing tough topics.
meanings.sent4: His writing style is like that of the ultrarealists, capturing raw emotions and experiences.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarealists' dedication to honesty sets them apart from others.

meanings.sent1: The artist's ultrarealists paintings were so lifelike.
meanings.sent2: Her ultrarealists approach to photography captures every detail beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarealists design of the room made it feel like a dreamy reality.
meanings.sent4: The movie's ultrarealists scenes transported the audience into a different world.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarealists depiction of nature in the painting was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: Studying the ultrarealists movement in art history class was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: Many artists were influenced by the ultrarealists of the past century.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarealists movement challenged traditional art norms in a bold way.
meanings.sent4: Visiting the museum, I was struck by the ultrarealists' attention to detail.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the ultrarealists movement can still be seen in modern art today.
